entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Near blizzard developing this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
